i.name: Call of the Freljord
i.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of Willump and a nearby ally.

q.name: Consume
q.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

w.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
w.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.

e.name: Snowball Barrage
e.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

r.name: Absolute Zero
r.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nunu's''' and '''Willump's''' next instance of damage dealt to an enemy {{tip|champion}}, large {{tip|monster}} or {{tip|turrets|structure}} grants both '''Willump''' and the nearest allied champion ''Call of the Freljord'' for 4 seconds, prioritizing the ally with {{sti|{{as|'''highest''' attack speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Call of the Freljord:}} Targets gain {{sti|{{as|20% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}. Additionally, '''Willump''' gains {{tip|splash damage}} on his [[basic attack]]s, dealing {{as|30% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} in a cone to enemies behind the target.
'''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' cannot trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' from the same enemy again for a time. Successive triggers of ''Call of the Freljord'' will stack the duration.
i1.name: Call of the Freljord
notes: * The splash damage will critically strike when the basic attack does, without dealing any bonus damage.

riot.name: Call of the Freljord
riot.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of Willump and a nearby ally.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' takes a bite of a target enemy after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|healing}} himself. The heal is increased by 50% when below {{as|{{sti|health|50% of '''maximum''' health}}}}.
Against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} he deals {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} instead, and restores 25% more health.
leveling:
{{st|Champion Damage|{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Champions|{{ap|75*0.8 to 215*0.8}} {{as|(+ 56% AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Champions|{{ap|75*0.8*1.5 to 215*0.8*1.5}} {{as|(+ 84% AP)}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' health)}}}}

{{st|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|340 to 980}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|75 to 215}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|75*1.5 to 215*1.5}} {{as|(+ 105% AP)}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
q1.name: Consume
notes: * Icon border glows when he is within the maximum healing threshold.

* If the ability would deal lethal damage and the target is a minion or small-medium monster, it will instead perform an unique animation, {{tip|stun|stunning}} and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them, and then deal the {{as|true damage}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the damage and the heal.

riot.name: Consume
riot.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.
riot.tooltip:
Willump takes a bite of an enemy, dealing damage and healing himself. This healing increases by {{ lowhealthhealingscalar*100 }}% when he is below {{ lowhealththreshhold*100 }}% health.

Monsters and minions: Deals {{ monsterminiondamage }} true damage and heals for {{ monsterhealing }}.

Champions: Deals {{ totalchampiondamage }} magic damage and heals for {{ championhealing }}.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' breaks free of active {{tip|slow|slowing}} effects and conjures a {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}} that he {{ct|channel|begins rolling|attack=false|move=true|cast=Recasting the ability will interrupt it. All the other abilities are disabled|items=false|consume=false|spells=false,false,false,false}} in the target direction for up to 10 seconds, increasing in power over 5 seconds. Its size radius also increases to {{pp|3|changedisplay=true|type=charge time|75 to 200|0 to 5|formula= Increases by 62.5 units every 2.5 seconds}} units. He can steer with a {{tt|slow turn rate|See notes.}} that increases over time; changing direction resets the turn rate.

The duo is slowed by 50% for the first 1 second, but is {{cci|Slow immune icon.png|border=false|Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune}} to other {{tip|slow|slows}} and keeps all movement speed buffs at time of cast for the duration of the charge. After {{tt|a delay|See notes.}}, the duo gains {{sti|ms|{{tt|{{as|14 movement speed}}|Estimated}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, up to the greater value between {{ft|Total MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}|Total [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|Uncapped]] Flat MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}}} (''click to toggle''). The bonus movement speed from ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' ignores the [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|movement speed cap]].

The snowball rolls over minions and small monsters in its path dealing {{as|magic damage}}, with the base damage increased by {{pp|6|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 400|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}} and the ratio increased by {{pp|6|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 100*2/3|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}}.

The snowball explodes upon colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, [[Champion summoned units#Minion|large champion summoned unit]], medium-large [[monster]] or terrain, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies, increased by {{pp|6|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 400|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}}, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{pp|6|type=charge time|0.5;0.5 to 0.75|0 to 5|displayformula=Increases per game tick after 1 second.}} seconds and subsequently {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{pp|12|type=charge time|0;0;0;0 to 0.5|0;1;2 to 5|displayformula=Increases per game tick after 2.33 seconds.}} seconds.

After 10 seconds, upon re-activation after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, or if the duo is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, they will let loose the snowball, sending it rolling forward for an additional {{pp|6|type=charge time|750;750 to 1750|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}} units during which it will not grow any larger and will explode upon colliding with an enemy unit.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Rollover Damage|{{ap|12 to 24}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Maximum Rollover Damage|{{ap|12*5 to 24*5}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
{{st|Minimum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36 to 72}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36*5 to 72*5}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
notes: * There are 3 stages where the turn rate increases from the original one:
** After turning for 1 second, the turn rate is increased to 175%.
** After turning for 3 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 250%.
** After turning for 6 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 325% where it caps.
* The time threshold to begin gaining bonus movement speed may be bugged, as Flat Bonus MS increases the time while % Bonus MS decreases the time.
** The formula appears to be (X / 100) - Y, where:
*** X = Total Flat MS after caps
* The delay is not modified from its initially calculated value on-cast, even if additional movement speed is gained.

* '''Nunu and Willump's''' movement speed always increases in increments of ~14, regardless of which total value he will reach. This takes 6 increments to reach the Total MS + 85, but may take more to reach the Uncapped Flat + 85. Due to flat bonuses increasing the time threshold, it is possible for the ability's effects to end before reaching the total uncapped movement speed.

* If '''Nunu''' turns continuously he will create a {{tt|600|Estimated}} unit circle, increased with '''bonus''' movement speed, striking the same point up to 3 times, for a maximum of {{ap|180|225|270|315|360}} {{as|(+ 300% AP)}} magic damage. The damage can be further increased by detonating the snowball, for a total of {{ap|360|450|540|630|720}} {{as|(+450% AP)}} magic damage.
* {{cai|Realm Warp|Ryze}} will only teleport '''Nunu and Willump''', leaving the {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}} behind.
* Hovering the cursor on the HUD (e.g minimap / champion portraits) does not affect the cast and steering of ''Biggest Snowball Ever!''.

riot.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
riot.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Willump rolls a snowball that grows in size and speed. When it collides with an enemy champion, large monster, or wall, it explodes, dealing up to {{ maximumsnowballdamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies and knocking them up for up to {{ maximumstunduration }}s.

Reactivating the ability releases the snowball and rolls it forward on a straight path.

Holding a turn causes Willump to turn faster in that direction.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu''' throws a volley of 3 snowballs in the target direction over {{fd|0.4}} seconds, each snowball shattering upon hitting an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone.
Enemies hit 3 times are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 50% for 1 second. Champions and large monsters hit once are also ''Snowbound'' for 4 seconds, resetting on each hit.
''Snowball Barrage'' can be re-activated up to 2 times at no cost for 3 seconds. An enemy cannot be {{tip|slow|slowed}} more than once. After 3 seconds, it is ''Willump's Turn''.
{{sbc|Willump's Turn:}} ''Snowbound'' enemies around '''Willump''' take {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{pp|0.5 to 1.5}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Damage Per Snowball|{{ap|16 to 48}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}}|Damage Per Volley|{{ap|16*3 to 48*3}} {{as|(+ 18% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|16*3*3 to 48*3*3}} {{as|(+ 54% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Snowball Barrage
notes: * Because of snowballs' cast time and travel time it is possible for ''Willump's Turn'' to come in while '''Nunu''' is still launching his snowballs.
* '''Nunu''' can move while casting ''Snowball Barrage''.

riot.name: Snowball Barrage
riot.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.
riot.tooltip:
Nunu throws 3 snowballs. Snowball Barrage can be cast two additional times to throw even more snowballs. Enemies hit take {{ totalsnowballdamage }} magic damage per snowball. Enemies hit by 3 consecutive snowballs are slowed by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }}s. Champions and large monsters become Snowbound.

Willump's Turn: After {{ totalspellduration }} seconds, all enemies within range that are Snowbound take {{ totalrootdamage }} magic damage and become rooted for {{ rootduration }}s.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu and Willump''' {{ct|channel|sap|cast=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,false}} heat from the surrounding area, {{tip|slow|slowing}} affected enemies by {{pp|13|type=channel time|key=%|0;50 to 95;95|0 to 3|displayformula=increases by 4.5% every 0.25 seconds. ''Starts at 0.25 seconds and finishes at 2.75 seconds''}}, as well as gaining a {{tip|shield}}. The affected area is hidden if the duo is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemy team.

After 3 seconds or if the duo is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, surrounding enemies take {{as|magic damage}}, reduced by {{pp|4|key=%|type=channel time|changedisplay=true|100 to 0|0 to 3}}. Once the channel ends, affected enemies will remain {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{pp|13|type=channel time|0 to 3|0 to 3}} seconds and any remaining shield will decay over 3 seconds.
The duo can interrupt the ability after {{fd|0.5}} seconds by inputting a movement command or casting one of their other abilities.
r1.name: Absolute Zero
notes: * No additional details.

riot.name: Absolute Zero
riot.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.
riot.tooltip:
Willump channels for {{ channelduration }} seconds, creating a powerful blizzard. Enemies in the blizzard are slowed by {{ slowstartamount*-100 }}%, increasing to {{ maxslowamount*-100 }}% over the duration. Nunu & Willump receive a shield that absorbs {{ totalshieldamount }} damage that decays over {{ shielddecayduration }} seconds after the blizzard ends.

When the blizzard ends, enemies in the area take up to {{ maximumdamage }} magic damage, based on the blizzard's duration.
